properties.name: front.resource-root-path
properties.description: Base URL used by the frontend to fetch generated assets (images, documents, ...).

properties.name: front.security.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable Spring Security for the frontend API.

properties.name: front.security.cors-allowed-hosts
properties.description: List of origins allowed for CORS requests.

properties.name: front.security.jwt-secret
properties.description: Secret key used to sign JWT tokens.

properties.name: front.security.shared-token
properties.description: Shared secret expected in the X-Shared-Token header for authenticated requests.

properties.name: front.security.access-token-expiry
properties.description: Access token validity duration.

properties.name: front.security.refresh-token-expiry
properties.description: Refresh token validity duration.

properties.name: front.cache.path
properties.description: Path used to store cached files.

properties.name: front.cache.one-minute-ttl
properties.description: Time to live applied to the ONE_MINUTE_LOCAL_CACHE_NAME cache.

properties.name: front.cache.one-minute-maximum-size
properties.description: Maximum number of entries stored in the ONE_MINUTE_LOCAL_CACHE_NAME cache.

properties.name: front.cache.one-hour-ttl
properties.description: Time to live applied to the ONE_HOUR_LOCAL_CACHE_NAME cache.

properties.name: front.cache.one-hour-maximum-size
properties.description: Maximum number of entries stored in the ONE_HOUR_LOCAL_CACHE_NAME cache.

properties.name: front.cache.one-day-ttl
properties.description: Time to live applied to the ONE_DAY_LOCAL_CACHE_NAME cache.

properties.name: front.cache.one-day-maximum-size
properties.description: Maximum number of entries stored in the ONE_DAY_LOCAL_CACHE_NAME cache.

properties.name: front.cache.forever-maximum-size
properties.description: Maximum number of entries stored in the FOREVER_LOCAL_CACHE_NAME cache.

properties.name: front.rate-limit.anonymous
properties.description: Maximum requests per minute for anonymous users.

properties.name: front.rate-limit.authenticated
properties.description: Maximum requests per minute for authenticated users.

properties.name: front.rate-limit.counter-ttl
properties.description: Duration before idle rate-limit counters are purged from memory.

properties.name: front.affiliation-partners.api-base-url
properties.description: Base URL of the affiliation partner back-office API.

properties.name: front.affiliation-partners.partners-path
properties.description: Path appended to the base URL to retrieve the partners collection.

properties.name: front.affiliation-partners.api-key
properties.description: API key forwarded when calling the affiliation partner backend.

properties.name: front.review-generation.api-base-url
properties.description: Base URL of the back-office API exposing review generation endpoints.

properties.name: front.review-generation.api-key
properties.description: API key forwarded when calling the review generation backend.

properties.name: front.review-generation.review-path
properties.description: Path appended to the base URL when triggering or polling review generation.

properties.name: front.share.crawler-extraction-enabled
properties.description: Enable extraction through the crawler service before applying slug fallback.

properties.name: front.share.resolution-window
properties.description: Maximum duration allocated to complete share resolution before timing out.

properties.name: front.share.store-ttl
properties.description: Time to live applied to in-memory share resolution snapshots.

properties.name: front.share.max-url-length
properties.description: Maximum length accepted for shared URLs.

properties.name: front.share.max-text-length
properties.description: Maximum length accepted for shared text snippets.

properties.name: front.share.max-title-length
properties.description: Maximum length accepted for optional shared titles.

properties.name: front.share.max-candidates
properties.description: Maximum number of candidates returned per resolution.

properties.name: front.contact.email
properties.description: Recipient email address for contact form submissions.

properties.name: front.partners.ecosystem.partners
properties.description: Configured ecosystem partners displayed on the public site.

properties.name: front.partners.ecosystem.partners[].name
properties.description: Display name of the ecosystem partner.

properties.name: front.partners.ecosystem.partners[].bloc-id
properties.description: XWiki bloc identifier linked to the partner content.

properties.name: front.partners.ecosystem.partners[].url
properties.description: Public website URL of the partner.

properties.name: front.partners.ecosystem.partners[].image-url
properties.description: Relative image URL rendered for the partner logo.

properties.name: front.partners.mentors.partners
properties.description: Configured mentor partners displayed on the public site.

properties.name: front.partners.mentors.partners[].name
properties.description: Display name of the mentor partner.

properties.name: front.partners.mentors.partners[].bloc-id
properties.description: XWiki bloc identifier linked to the mentor content.

properties.name: front.partners.mentors.partners[].url
properties.description: Public website URL of the mentor partner.

properties.name: front.partners.mentors.partners[].image-url
properties.description: Relative image URL rendered for the mentor partner logo.

properties.name: team-config.cores
properties.description: Core eco-nudger team members.

properties.name: team-config.cores[].name
properties.description: Full name of the core team member.

properties.name: team-config.cores[].linked-in-url
properties.description: LinkedIn profile URL of the core team member.

properties.name: team-config.cores[].image-url
properties.description: Relative URL for the core team member portrait.

properties.name: team-config.cores[].bloc-id
properties.description: XWiki bloc identifier providing the member biography.

properties.name: team-config.contributors
properties.description: Extended contributors supporting the core team.

properties.name: team-config.contributors[].name
properties.description: Full name of the contributor.

properties.name: team-config.contributors[].linked-in-url
properties.description: LinkedIn profile URL of the contributor.

properties.name: team-config.contributors[].image-url
properties.description: Relative URL for the contributor portrait.

properties.name: team-config.contributors[].bloc-id
properties.description: XWiki bloc identifier providing the contributor biography.

properties.name: price-config.events
properties.description: Commercial events grouped by language key (e.g. fr, en).

properties.name: price-config.events[].label
properties.description: Localised event label displayed on the calendar.

properties.name: price-config.events[].start-date
properties.description: Inclusive start date of the commercial event.

properties.name: price-config.events[].end-date
properties.description: Inclusive end date of the commercial event.

properties.name: price-config.events[].color
properties.description: CSS compatible colour hint rendered by the frontend.
